summary: Completed frontend testing of updated Iron Toxicity and NSAID Toxicity approaches with collapsible sections, ml/mg conversion, and Bahrain-specific liquid preparations. All 10 test cases passed successfully.
passed_tests: Iron Toxicity has collapsible sections with arrow indicators (▼/▲) that expand/collapse on click
Iron Toxicity has Tablets (mg) / Liquid (ml) toggle buttons - both modes work correctly
Iron Toxicity Liquid mode shows Bahrain preparations: Feroglobin Syrup, Ferrous Sulfate Syrup, Fer-In-Sol Drops, Iberet Folic Liquid, Maltofer Syrup, Maltofer Drops, Custom/Other
Iron Toxicity calculation correct: 30ml of Maltofer Drops (50mg/ml, 100% elemental) = 1500mg elemental iron, 150 mg/kg for 10kg patient
NSAID Toxicity has collapsible sections with arrow indicators
NSAID Toxicity has Tablets (mg) / Liquid (ml) toggle buttons

NSAID Toxicity Liquid mode shows Bahrain preparations: Ibuprofen Syrup (Brufen/Nurofen) 100mg/5ml, Forte 200mg/5ml, Infant Drops 40mg/ml, Naproxen Suspension, Diclofenac Suspension, Mefenamic Acid (Ponstan) with ⚠️ warning, Custom/Other
NSAID Toxicity calculation correct: 50ml of Brufen syrup (20mg/ml) = 1000mg, 100 mg/kg for 10kg patient
Colors are muted/subtle using Tailwind -50 variants (bg-red-50, bg-amber-50, bg-green-50) instead of bright saturated colors
Custom/Other option allows manual entry of concentration (mg/ml) and elemental iron percentage selection
critical_code_review_comments: Section.jsx component properly implements collapsible UI with arrow rotation animation
Iron liquid preparations correctly configured with perMl values for accurate calculations
NSAID liquid preparations include Ponstan with special 24h observation warning flag
Custom/Other option properly shows concentration and elemental % inputs when selected
Color scheme uses muted Tailwind colors (-50 variants) for subtle appearance
data-testid attributes properly implemented: iron-liquid-selector, iron-ml-input, nsaid-liquid-selector, nsaid-ml-input
context_for_next_testing_agent: Iron Toxicity and NSAID Toxicity approaches updated with: 1) Collapsible sections using Section.jsx component, 2) Tablets (mg) / Liquid (ml) toggle buttons, 3) Bahrain-specific liquid preparations dropdown. Iron liquid preps: Feroglobin 23.5mg gluconate/5ml (12%), Fer-In-Sol 75mg sulfate/ml (20%), Maltofer Drops 50mg/ml (100%). NSAID liquid preps: Brufen 100mg/5ml (20mg/ml), Forte 200mg/5ml (40mg/ml), Infant Drops 40mg/ml, Ponstan 50mg/5ml (10mg/ml with 24h observation). Navigation: Login > Dashboard > Children > Approaches > Select Iron Toxicity or NSAID Toxicity from dropdown.
